result.TEXT:
Create a JDBCInputSource object from information in a property file. It also loads the specified JDBC driver. The property file must have following entries:
JDBC driver to be loaded to access the database: "driver" JDBC URL of database: "URL" User name to be used to access the database: "user" Password to be used to access the database: "password" Table to be parsed: "table"
Parameters:propertyFile - name of property file describing the database sourceReturns:a JDBCInputSource objectThrows:java.io.IOException - if an i/o error occursjava.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if an JDBC driver specified cannot be loaded
setupSourceFromProperties

Create a JDBCInputSource object from information in a property object. Parameters:dbProperties - A propery object descrbing the JDBC sourceReturns:a JDBCInputSource objectThrows:java.io.IOException - if an i/o error occursjava.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if an JDBC driver specified cannot be loaded
